explanation: The stage direction describes a change in the setting of the play. It mentions that everything disappears and the theatre changes to represent the interior of a formidable castle of the kings of Bactria. This is indicative of a change in the stage description or play location.
stgdir: Tout disparaît. Le Théâtre change. Il représente l'intérieur redoutable du château-fort des rois de la Bactriane
